name: Vortex Mod Manager
notes: Plug and play installation, everything configured out of the box for games installed for Steam Play or Lutris Winesteam. Check https://github.com/rockerbacon/lutris-skyrimse-installers for more information. Working Games: - TESV: Skyrim Special Edition - TESV: Skyrim - TESIV: Oblivion - Fallout 4 - Fallout 3 - Game of the Year Edition - Fallout 3 - Fallout New Vegas - Morrowind KNOWN BUGS/LIMITATIONS: - The game cannot be launched from within the application; - If a new game is installed after Vortex, it'll be unable to manage mods for that game untill the symlinks are rebuild; - After Vortex update 0.18.7, having the dashlets "Announcements", "News" and "Latest Mods" enabled in "Settings" can cause Vortex to go on a crash loop after a game is added

input_menu.description:
ATTENTION!
 -Vortex cannot be updated after installed, doing so will break it
 -After installation finishes, Vortex will start. Before adding any games you must go to "Settings" and disable "Annoucements", "News" and "Latest Mods" in the "Interface" tab, otherwise you'll get stuck in a crash loop

options.waiting: Click here after you read everything carefully

options.proceed: I'm aware of what I need to do, procced with the installation

content:
files:
- setup: https://github.com/Nexus-Mods/Vortex/releases/download/v0.17.11/vortex-setup-0.17.11.exe
- symlinks_setup: https://github.com/rockerbacon/lutris-skyrimse-installers/releases/download/1.7/vortex-symlinks.sh
- downloads_handler: https://github.com/rockerbacon/lutris-skyrimse-installers/releases/download/1.7/vortex-downloads-handler.desktop
game:
  exe: drive_c/Program Files/Black Tree Gaming Ltd/Vortex/Vortex.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- copy:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/config_scripts
    src: symlinks_setup
- chmodx: $GAMEDIR/config_scripts/vortex-symlinks.sh
- copy:
    dst: $HOME/.local/share/applications
    src: downloads_handler
- chmodx: $HOME/.local/share/applications/vortex-downloads-handler.desktop
- execute:
    file: $GAMEDIR/config_scripts/vortex-symlinks.sh
- task:
    app: dotnet46 win10
    description: Installing .NET 4.6
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    key: Installed Path
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\Software\Wow6432Node\Bethesda Softworks\Skyrim Special
      Edition
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    type: REG_SZ
    value: c:\\program files (x86)\\steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim special edition
- task:
    key: Installed Path
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\Software\Wow6432Node\Valve\Steam\Apps\489830
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    type: REG_SZ
    value: c:\\program files (x86)\\steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim special edition
- task:
    key: Installed Path
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\Software\Wow6432Node\Bethesda Softworks\Skyrim
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    type: REG_SZ
    value: c:\\program files (x86)\\steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim
- task:

    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\Software\Wow6432Node\Valve\Steam\Apps\72850
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    type: REG_SZ
    value: c:\\program files (x86)\\steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim
- task:
    key: Installed Path
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\Software\Wow6432Node\Bethesda Softworks\Oblivion
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    type: REG_SZ

- task:
    key: Installed Path
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\Software\Wow6432Node\Valve\Steam\Apps\22330
    prefix: $GAMEDIR

- task:

    prefix: $GAMEDIR

- input_menu:
    description: "ATTENTION!\n -Vortex cannot be updated after installed, doing so\
      \ will break it\n -After installation finishes, Vortex will start. Before adding\
      \ any games you must go to \"Settings\" and disable \"Annoucements\", \"News\"\
      \ and \"Latest Mods\" in the \"Interface\" tab, otherwise you'll get stuck in\
      \ a crash loop"
    options:
    - waiting: Click here after you read everything carefully
    - proceed: I'm aware of what I need to do, procced with the installation
    preselect: waiting
- task:
    executable: setup
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
wine:
  dxvk: true
  version: tkg-4.0-x86_64
